andromeda.why: Listens without surrendering self; protects speaker’s agency.

arcturus.why: Creates a clean container for confidences—placement and pacing.

draco.why: Keeps oaths and guards access—loyalty to the told story.

orion-dark.why: Risk of collecting secrets as leverage or complying with hush-culture.

orion-light.why: Courage to hear hard truths without flinching.

pleiades.why: Attuned, soothing presence that invites safe sharing.

sirius.why: Private listening, not transmission or protocol yet.

andromeda.why: Holds another’s story without taking it over.

arcturus.why: Clarifies scope and boundaries—what is stored, where, and when to speak.

draco.why: Enforces confidentiality—rank of access and trust.

orion-dark.why: Silence can slide into coerced secrecy or doctrine deference.

orion-light.why: Ethical restraint under pressure to disclose.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement steadies the nervous system of the teller.

andromeda.why: Victim–savior loops emerge when stories are traded for belonging.

arcturus.why: Boundary/placement fails—oversharing or misfiling of confidences.

draco.why: Gossip as status control; clique gatekeeping of information.

orion-dark.why: Secrecy becomes a control vector—dogma and compliance via intel.

orion-light.why: Ordeal teaches discernment and ethical containment.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing leaks or distorts the narrative.

sirius.why: No stable pedagogy—this is trial-and-error containment.

andromeda.why: Protects sovereignty by negotiating what can be shared.

arcturus.why: Builds formats for listening and release—clear intake and timing.

draco.why: Maintains loyalty and access rules around sensitive history.

lyra.why: Shapes narrative so memory becomes useable culture.

orion-dark.why: Process can harden into policy that suppresses inconvenient truths.

pleiades.why: Hospitable forum that calms and includes witnesses.

sirius.why: Teaches confidentiality and release protocol by example.

andromeda.why: Truth-telling liberates the group from oppressive narratives.

arcturus.why: Curates archives, standards, and cadence for what is recorded and told.

draco.why: Upholds oaths and mission loyalty around the record.

orion-dark.why: Risk of orthodoxy policing: history as leverage.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity when pressured to edit the record.

pleiades.why: Mentoring tone helps communities integrate the past.

sirius.why: Instruction in record-keeping and release—liberation through teaching.

andromeda.why: Elder witness frees futures by airing truths at right time.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring norms for containment and disclosure.

draco.why: Presence can read as gate to history—ranked access.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to revise canon when truth demands.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards and truth-telling, not soothing.

sirius.why: Royal historian signal—teaches the law of memory and release by presence.
